      • removeTeamReports

        public static void removeTeamReports(java.lang.Long[] reportId,
                                     java.lang.Long teamId)
        Removes the team-reports and member-reports association table.
        Parameters:
        reportId - A Long array of the reports to be updated
        teamId - The teamId of the team whose association with the specified reports must be removed. When the teams are dissociated with the reports, the association from the members of that team also gets removed.

        Parameters:
